description:
Satou has to deliver on an arrangement where countless factors have been twisted against him, but will that be enough to keep him from pulling through?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Trip to the Underworld That Started with a Death March
Death March kara Hajimaru I(Se)kai Ryojou
Les sentiments d’un voyageur dans un (autre) monde venant d’une death march
デスマーチからはじまる異(世)界旅情
